unittitle_ssm: Andrés Vera Martínez ink on paper drawings
abstract_ssm: The collection consists of two  14"x17" ink on paper drawings from pages 8 and 10 of Andrés Vera Martínez's work entitled Breuckelen 1679: Voyage to New Netherland, 2010.
